benchmark_details.name: GRAPHIC BENCH
benchmark_details.overview: GRAPHIC BENCH is a planning benchmark for graphic design that covers 1,079 user queries and input images across four design types.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the design planning abilities of LLM agents in graphic design tasks.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: GRAPHIC BENCH assumes user queries explicitly specify text and image content.

data.source: 1,079 user queries paired with input images collected from various design projects on the Behance platform.
data.annotation: Human-annotated user queries and design outputs.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the performance of LLM agents in completing design tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Scores across various metrics indicate the effectiveness and accuracy of design outputs.
methodology.validation: Validated through automated evaluations and human assessments.
